text: Dear JD users: We have updated the "JD Privacy Policy". This version of the update mainly focuses on the collection and use of personal information in the service scenario in the service scenario, the information collection method in the payment function, and the use of personal information use rules in order to use in orderYou can understand the protection policy of personal information more clearly and intuitively.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: We updated the JD Privacy Policy.

text: 【Special Note】

This policy is only applicable to the products and services and services provided by Beijing Jingdong Sanbai Lu Shidu Electronic Commerce Co., Ltd. and its affiliated companies (including but not limited to Beijing Jingdong Century Trading Co., Ltd., the following or "Us" or "JD")The function of extension (hereinafter referred to as "Jingdong Service"), including JD APP, website, client, applet, and new forms that appear with technology development to you.

If a certain product we provided has a separate privacy policy or a special agreement in the corresponding user service agreement, the privacy policy of the product will be given priority.The content is prevailing.

If we use the products or services provided by JD.com in our affiliated company but have not set up an independent privacy policy, this privacy policy is also applicable to this part of the product or service.
Please read the "JD Privacy Policy" (especially the content of the band) and determine our personal information processing rules.
During the reading process, if you have any questions, you can consult us through the contact information in JD.com.

Version Effective Date: April 20, 2022

introduction
Welcome to use JD!
We attach great importance to user privacy and personal information protection.
When you use our products and/or services, we may collect and use your relevant information.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: We hope to explain to you how we collect, use, save, share and transfer, and transfer it to you when you use our products and/or services, as well, Update, delete and protect this information.
This privacy policy will help you understand the following:
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
2. How do we use cookies and similar technologies
3. How do we provide your personal information outside
4. How do we protect and save your personal information
5. How do you manage personal information
6. Protection of personal information of minors
7. Notification and revision
8. How to contact us

This privacy policy is closely related to the JD service you use and the various business functions (hereinafter collectively referred to as "our products and/or services").It is confirmed that you have fully understood the content stated in this privacy policy, and let you make a proper choice in accordance with the guidance of this privacy policy.
In the related terms involved in this privacy policy, we try to make a concise expression as much as possible and provide further explanation links so that you can better understand.
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
Personal information is a variety of information related to the recognized or recognizable natural person recorded in electronics or other methods, excluding information after anonymous processing.

Sensitive personal information is personal information that can easily cause the personality dignity of natural persons to be infringed or harmed by personal and property security, including biometrics, religious beliefs, specific identities, medical health, financial accounts, trajectory trajectory, etc.And personal information of minors under the age of 14.

We will follow the principles of legitimate, legal, and necessary. For the following goals described in this policy, collect and use personal information that you actively provide or use products and/or services in the process of using products and services.And get your personal information from a third party.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If we want to use your personal information for other purposes that are not stated in this policy, or use information collected based on specific purposes for other purposes, we will inform you in a reasonable way, and recruitGet your consent.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: For example, we want to use your information to exceed the use of this policy, or to use the information collected based on specific purposes for other purposes, and will inform you and obtain your consent.

text: (1) You must authorize us to collect and use your personal information

text: 2. How do we use cookies and similar technologies
(1) Use of cookies
1. In order to realize the personalized needs of your online experience, you can get a easier access experience.
We will send one or more small data files called Cookies on your computer or mobile device, and the cookies specified to you are the only one. It can only be read to the Web server in your domain.

We send you cookies to simplify the steps that you repeat login, store your shopping preferences or products in your shopping cart, and so on to provide you with your shopping preference settings, help you optimize the choice and interaction of advertising, help judge youLogin status and account or data security.
label: Data Retention
Important
Usage
rewrite: Cookies can simplify data such as your repeated login, store your shopping preferences, or data in your shopping cart.

text: 2. We will not use any uses outside the purpose of this privacy policy.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We will not use Cookies for any purpose except the purpose of this privacy policy.

text: You can manage or delete Cookies according to your preferences.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can manage or delete Cookies according to your preferences.

text: You can remove everything saved on the computer, cookies, and most of the network browsers will automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify the setting of the browser according to your needs to reject, cookies;
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can usually modify the browser settings according to your needs to reject cookies.

text: In addition, you can also remove all cookies stored in the software.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can also remove all cookies stored in the software.

text: But if you do this, you may need to change the user settings when you visit the JD.com website, and the corresponding information you recorded before will be deleted, and it may have a certain impact on the security of your service.
label: Edit/Control

text: (2) The use of network beacon and similar technologies
In addition to cookies, we will also use other similar technologies such as network Beacon on the website.
Our webpage often contains some electronic images (called "single pixel" GIF file or "network beacon").
We use the network beacon method::
(1) Calculate the number of user access through the use of the Internet Beacon on the JD website, and use the access, cookies to identify registered JD users.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: By using the Internet Beacon on the JD website, calculating the number of user access, and accessing the registered JD users by visiting Cookies.

text: (2) Provide you with personalized services through the Cookies information.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Provide you with personalized services by obtained cookies.

(2) Entrusted processing
We may entrust a partner to handle your personal information in order to provide you with corresponding products or services.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: We may entrust a partner to handle your personal information in order to provide you with corresponding products or services.

text: But we will only share your personal information for legal, correct, necessary, specific, and clear purposes, and only share the necessary personal information that provides products or services.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: We will only share your personal information for legal, correct, necessary, specific, and clear purposes, and only share the necessary personal information that provides products or services.

text: If our partner uses your personal information for our unreasonable purpose, it will obtain your consent alone.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: If our partner uses your personal information for our unreasonable purpose, it will obtain your consent alone.

text: Our partners include the following types:
(1) Supplier providing technical services.

We may provide your personal information to a third party that supports our functions, including suppliers providing us with infrastructure technical services, data analysis services and data processing services.

Important
rewrite: We may provide your personal information to a third party that supports our functions.

text: (2) Advertising and analysis service partners.

We will comply with laws and regulations and general safety technologies of the industry, and entrust these partners to handle information about advertising, coverage, and effectiveness related to advertising.

Those who need to transfer personal information for reasons for merging, separation, dissolution, and declaration of bankruptcy, we will inform you the name or name and contact information of the receiver, and the company that requires your personal information and the organization will continue to be constrained by the privacy policy of this privacy policy.Otherwise, we will ask the company and the organization to reconcile your authorization consent.

text: 4. How do we protect and save your personal information
(1) We protect your personal information technology and measures
We attach great importance to personal information security and take all reasonable and feasible measures to protect your personal information:
1. Data security technical measures

We will adopt security measures that meet industry standards, including establishing reasonable institutional specifications and security technology to prevent your personal information from being accessed and modified by unauthorized access to avoid data damage or loss.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Establish a reasonable institutional norms and security technologies to prevent your personal information from being accessed and modified by unauthorized access to avoid damage or loss of data.

text: For example: JD.com's network service adopts encrypted technologies such as transport layer security protocols, and provides browsing services through HTTPS and other methods to ensure the security of user data during transmission;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Encryption technologies such as transport layer security protocols are adopted to ensure the security of user data during transmission.

text: JD.com adopts encrypted technology to encrypt the user's personal information and isolate through isolation technology;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Use encrypted technology to encrypt the user's personal information and isolate through isolation technology.

text: When the personal information is used, such as personal information display and personal information association calculation, we will use multiple data desensitization technologies including content replacement and SHA256 to enhance personal information in use;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will adopt a variety of data desensitization technology including content replacement and SHA256 to enhance personal information in the use of personal information.

text: JD.com adopts strict data access permissions control and multiple identity authentication technology to protect personal information to avoid the use of data from illegal use;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Use strict data access permissions control and multiple identity authentication technology to protect personal information to avoid illegal use of data.

text: JD.com uses code security automatic inspection and data access log analysis technology for personal information security audit.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Use code security automatic inspection and data access log analysis technology for personal information security audit.

text: 2. JD.com's other security measures to protect personal information

Jingdong manages the storage and use of personal information by establishing a data classification hierarchical system, data security management specifications, and data security development specifications;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Manage the storage and use of personal information by establishing a data classification grading system, data security management specifications, and data security development specifications.

text: Through information contacts confidentiality agreement, monitoring and auditing mechanisms to fully control the data;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Through information contacts confidentiality agreements, monitoring and auditing mechanisms, the data is fully securely controlled.

text: JD.com establishes the data security committee and has a full -time information protection department and the data security emergency response organization to promote and ensure personal information security.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Establish a data security committee and set up information protection full -time departments and data security emergency response organizations to promote and ensure personal information security.

text: We store your personal information underlying cloud technology obtained the third -level certification of the "Trusted Cloud" certification issued by the Data Center Alliance, passed the third -level certification of security level protection of the Ministry of Public Security, and also obtained ISO27000 certification.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The underlying cloud technology has obtained the third -level certification of the "Trusted Cloud" certification issued by the Data Center Alliance, passed the third -level certification of the Ministry of Public Security's security level protection, and also obtained ISO27000 certification.

text: We will also organize safety and privacy protection training courses to strengthen employees' awareness of protecting personal information.
label: Important
Data Security

text: We only allow employees and partners of JD.com and JD.com to visit personal information, and to set up strict access to control and monitoring mechanisms for this.

Data Security
rewrite: Only employees and partners who are necessary to know about information are allowed to visit personal information, and for this reason, it has set up access permissions control and monitoring mechanisms.

text: We also require all personnel who may be exposed to your personal information to fulfill the corresponding confidentiality obligations.
label: Important
rewrite: All personnel who may be exposed to your personal information fulfill the corresponding confidentiality obligations.

text: The Internet is not an absolutely secure environment, and the communication method of email, instant messaging, and social software cannot determine whether it is completely encrypted. We recommend that you use complex passwords when using such tools and pay attention to protect your personal information security security security.Essence
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: It is recommended that you use complex passwords when using such tools and pay attention to protecting personal information security.

text: When conducting online products and/or service transactions through JD.com and third parties, you inevitably disclose your personal information from the transaction opponent or potential transaction, such as contact method or postal address.
Please protect your personal information properly and provide them with others only.
3. Safety event disposal

In order to cope with the possible risks of personal information leakage, damage and loss, we have formulated a number of systems to clarify the classification and classification standards of security events, the classification standards of security vulnerabilities, and the corresponding processing process.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We have formulated a number of systems to clarify the classification and classification standards of security events, safety vulnerabilities, and corresponding processing processes.

text: We have also established a special emergency response team for security incidents. In accordance with the requirements of safety incidents, we initiated the safety plan for different security incidents to conduct stop loss, analysis, positioning, formulation of remedial measures, and combined with relevant departments to trace the source and strike.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Start a safety plan for different security incidents, conduct stop loss, analysis, positioning, formulation of remedial measures, and combined with relevant departments to trace back and crack down.

text: Once the personal information security incident occurs, we will inform you in a timely manner in accordance with the requirements of the laws and regulations: the basic situation and possible impact of the security incident, the disposal measures we have taken or we are going to take, the suggestions that you can prevent and reduce risks independently and reduce risks, Remedy for your remedy.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If a personal information security incident occurs, we will inform your basic situation, possible impact, disposal measures, independent prevention suggestions, etc.

text: At the same time, we will inform you that the incident -related situation is promptly informing the event, letter, telephone, push notification, etc. When it is difficult to inform the subject of personal information one by one, we will publish an announcement in a reasonable and effective way.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: It is difficult to inform personal information by mail, letter, telephone, and push notification one by one, and will be announced in a reasonable and effective way.

text: At the same time, we will also actively report to the disposal of personal information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the regulatory authorities.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Report the disposal of personal information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the regulatory authorities.

If you find your personal information disclosure, especially your account number and password leak, please immediately contact us through the clear contact information in this privacy policy "8. How to contact us" so that we can take corresponding measures.

7. Notification and revision
1. To provide you with better services and with the development of JD business, this privacy policy will be updated.
But without your clear consent, we will not reduce the rights you should enjoy in accordance with the privacy policy.

We will issue a updated version on the JD.com website and JD.com and remind you to update the relevant content through the website announcement or other appropriate ways before taking effect. Please also visit JD in order to understand the latest privacy policy in a timely manner.

text: 2. Under normal circumstances, we will reply within 15 days.

If you are not satisfied with our response, especially our personal information processing behavior harms your legitimate rights and interests, you can also complain or report to the regulatory authorities such as online information, telecommunications, public security, and industry and commerce.
Attachment: Personal information and sensitive personal information examples (personal information collected by non -Jingdong APP or website, only for example descriptions)
Personal information is a variety of information related to the recognized or recognizable natural person recorded in electronics or other methods, excluding information after anonymous processing.

Sensitive personal information is personal information that can easily cause the personality dignity of natural persons to be infringed or harmed by personal and property security, including biometrics, religious beliefs, specific identities, medical health, financial accounts, trajectory trajectory, etc.And personal information of minors under the age of 14.
(This definition comes from the "Personal Information Protection Law of the People's Republic of China").
